name: virtual_salt_flux_correction
description: The virtual_salt_flux_into_sea_water_due_to_process is the salt flux that would have the same effect on the sea surface salinity as water_flux_out_of_sea_water_due_to_process. Flux correction is also called "flux adjustment". A positive flux correction is downward i.e. added to the ocean.  In accordance with common usage in geophysical disciplines, "flux" implies per unit area, called "flux density" in physics.
